page.title: 13CRIME IN HEDON
page.content: {Traffic Offences.} Cars and lorries have been speeding along New Road in Hedon.The police have tried to stop this by keeping a check on the speed of passing cars.Three times a week a{speed gun {trap} is set up in the bus shelter so that the police can catch offenders or deter drivers from driving too fast. The speed limit is 30mph. { {Crime Detection Rate.} Hedon does not have a major crime problem.Minor crimes such as burglary vandalism and assaults do occur.Many crimes are solved because Hedon has a high crime detection rate.In March'85 it was 41%,in April'85 it was 50%. Hedon is a good place to live because not many crimes or offences are committed here.
